title: Complementary and Alternative Medicine (CAM) Communication Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing knowledge and patient counseling experience
context.additional_context: Process where pre-service teachers train CAM-related communication skills via virtual patient scenarios using smartphone applications

learning_goals: Learners can listen to patient concerns about CAM (Complementary and Alternative Medicine) use in virtual simulation environments and provide appropriate feedback.
Learners can establish patient education strategies for CAM use based on risk-benefit assessments.
Learners can improve communication self-efficacy by 20% or more through simulation result analysis.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
